description: Displays a list of categories for all event source types, or, if specified, for a specified source type.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The type of source that is generating the events. Valid values: db-instance, db-parameter-group, db-security-group.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: This parameter is not currently supported. (dict) --- A named set of filter values, used to return a more specific list of results. You can use a filter to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs. Wildcards are not supported in filters. The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive. One or more filter values. Filter values are case sensitive. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: One or more filter values. Filter values are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: EventCategoriesMapList
nested_items.description: A list of event category maps.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The source type that the returned categories belong to.

nested_items.name: EventCategories
nested_items.description: The event categories for the specified source type.
